[url='https://ca.ign.com/articles/2013/02/28/full-trailer-for-dreamfall-chapters-released']Today, a full trailer has been revealed for the game.[/url] I am so excited. TLJ is my favorite game, and Dreamfall, even though it had many flaws, still was quite good in my opinion. I have already backed its Kickstarter, [url='https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/redthread/dreamfall-chapters-the-longest-journey']but have you ?[/url] You still have 9 days to go if you want to. It also hit [url='https://www.polygon.com/2013/2/27/4035090/dreamfall-chapters-hits-steam-greenlight']Steam Greenlight a couple of days ago[/url], so don't forget to approve it !
To those who don't know the series:
[b]Dreamfall Chapters: The Longest Journey is a 3D adventure game for Mac, Linux and Windows PC that takes the player on a darkly magical journey across the twin worlds of Stark and Arcadia; from a futuristic cyberpunk vision of our world, to a high-fantasy realm of powerful sorcery and dangerous beauty. [/b]
[i]The Story
The world of Arcadia exists in parallel and balance with ours. It is a world of magic and chaos, a world that acts as a counterweight to the world of science and order. The Balance between the twin worlds is watched over by the Guardian, who channels the energies of Chaos and Order between Arcadia and Stark, our world.
Some people are able to move freely between worlds. These very special and gifted individuals are called Shifters. There are not many of them, and those who can Shift keep it a secret to the world, in order to protect the precarious Balance.
A few people can travel in a different way. They dream themselves into other worlds, existing in two places at once. These individuals are called Dreamers.
At this point, there is only one known Dreamer in the twin worlds:[/i] Zoë Castillo.
Discuss !
